cs.LG, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.ST

Reasoning: The paper deals with the problem of estimating an unknown Markov chain from its samples, which is a fundamental problem in statistical learning. This problem is closely related to several sub-fields of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), information theory (cs.IT), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and statistics (cs.ST). Therefore, it is likely that the paper could be classified under any of these sub-categories. However, given that the paper focuses on the theoretical analysis of the problem, it is most likely to be classified under cs.LG (Machine Learning) or cs.IT (Information Theory).
